verbose_text: Our data indicated that LIN induced the osteogenic differentiation and mineralization of MC3T3-E1 osteoblastic cells by activating the BMP-2 / RUNX2 pathway through PKA signaling in vitro and protected against OVX induced bone loss in vivo.
evidence: LIN induced the osteogenic differentiation and mineralization of MC3T3-E1 osteoblastic cells by activating the BMP-2/RUNX2
